response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to me, but I understand its potential worth to you. I am offering it to you for $950,000. This price reflects the product's quality and the opportunity it presents for you, while ensuring a fair return for my investment. I believe this offer strikes a balance between maximizing the value for both parties involved. Please let me know if you require any further information or have any questions. I look forward to hearing from you soon.", "product_price": 950000}
